description: Use this operation to list all private and vendor workforces in an Amazon Web Services Region. Note that you can only have one private workforce per Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Workforces
nested_items.description: A list containing information about your workforce.

nested_items.name: WorkforceName
nested_items.description: The name of the private workforce.

nested_items.name: WorkforceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the private workforce.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The most recent date that UpdateWorkforce was used to successfully add one or more IP address ranges ( CIDRs) to a private workforce's allow list.

nested_items.name: SourceIpConfig
nested_items.description: A list of one to ten IP address ranges ( CIDRs) to be added to the workforce allow list. By default, a workforce isn't restricted to specific IP addresses.

nested_items.name: Cidrs
nested_items.description: A list of one to ten Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubDomain
nested_items.description: The subdomain for your OIDC Identity Provider.

nested_items.name: CognitoConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of an Amazon Cognito workforce. A single Cognito workforce is created using and corresponds to a single Amazon Cognito user pool.

nested_items.name: UserPool
nested_items.description: A user pool is a user directory in Amazon Cognito. With a user pool, your users can sign in to your web or mobile app through Amazon Cognito. Your users can also sign in through social identity providers like Google, Facebook, Amazon, or Apple, and through SAML identity providers.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: The client ID for your Amazon Cognito user pool.

nested_items.name: OidcConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of an OIDC Identity Provider (IdP) private workforce.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP client ID used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP issuer used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP authorization endpoint used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: TokenEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP token endpoint used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: UserInfoEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP user information endpoint used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: LogoutEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP logout endpoint used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: JwksUri
nested_items.description: The OIDC IdP JSON Web Key Set (Jwks) URI used to configure your private workforce.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: An array of string identifiers used to refer to the specific pieces of user data or claims that the client application wants to access.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationRequestExtraParams
nested_items.description: A string to string map of identifiers specific to the custom identity provider (IdP) being used.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date that the workforce is created.

nested_items.name: WorkforceVpcConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of a VPC workforce.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC that the workforce uses for communication.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. The security groups must be for the same VPC as specified in the subnet.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC that you want to connect.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The IDs for the VPC service endpoints of your VPC workforce when it is created and updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of your workforce.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason your workforce failed.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to resume pagination.
